title: Byzantine-Inspired Greece Wellness Retreat with World-Class Day Spa
description: Deep in the pine-covered hills of the Peloponnese Peninsula, you'll find Europe's leading wellness destination at Euphoria Retreat. More than just a hotel, visit and immerse yourself in the hotel's healing practises, where mind, body and soul are nurtured through food, spa treatments and activities. The spa combines ancient Hellenic medicine with traditional Chinese medicine to create a range of treatments guaranteed to reinvigorate (the Hellenic Hammam is a must-do during your visit).
